roomdetails.name: LUXURY ROOM
roomdetails.description: Deluxe luxury room are Peaceful and spacious, rest among the city.Furnished with a king size bed refreshing, comfortable spaces that afford peace and tranquility .

roomdetails.name: FAMILY ROOM
roomdetails.description: Perfectly designed for travelers with children.Deluxe Family rooms come as either a double or twin, and feature sofa, bed.Ideal for families wanting to experience luxury

roomdetails.name: Executive Room
roomdetails.description: Business Executive rooms are perfect for your business trips into Bangalore, rooms come as Twin Sharing bed. It is perfect for Business travelers.

roomdetails.name: Class Suite
roomdetails.description: Enjoy a two-room suite perfectly equipped for comfort and convenience With a private bedroom and separate living room. you have got two room for family, work or both.
